Thai: The actual exchange rate will be recalculated at the counter service.

Thai: Your account has insufficient balance.\nPlease fund your account.

Thai: The current rate has been changed.\nPlease refresh the quote.

Thai: Your documents have been reviewed and your identity has been successfully verified.\n\nYou can proceed to the next step.

Thai: Do you want to cancel the order?

Thai: If you wish to cancel the order, you can select the 'Confirm Cancel Order' button to make a new transaction.\nNote that you can cancel orders up to 5 times per day. If the limit is exceeded, the system will lock you out of using this feature.

Thai: Please Scan QR Code on the counter services.

Thai: Verify your identity with the branch staff.  Please prepare the following documents for withdrawing money at the branch:

Thai: And bring the mobile phone you used for the withdrawal transaction to complete the process at the service point.

Thai: The transaction will be automatically cancelled at the end of the day.

Thai: In order to protect your account, withdrawals, and payment services, will be disabled for 24 hours after you change your password.

Thai: Use at least 1 lowercase and 1 uppercase character

English: These are the devices currently allowed to access your account.

English: Are you sure you want to delete this device?
